name: Robot Dreams (Derabo)
description:
- Robot Dreams -

(if the game seems to not be loading just spam the play button for a second. it will load in a bit!)

A cute little platformer with a twist made for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1.

If you stream or record for youtube while reviewing the Jam's game PLEASE drop a link to your channel in the comments. I'd love to see how people enjoy the game.

Music created by the talented Oathr (Soundcloud)

Robot model by Poll (Blendswap)

This game was created in one week so there are quite a few bugs.

I didn't have any time to work on the games performance so it might run really bad on some machines. If you get stuck or die when you think you shouldn't have remember this. It's propably not your fault. Sorry : /
